scripts.preversion: git stash && git checkout master && git pull && npm test && git checkout -B bumpVersion && grunt build && grunt copyForPublish && git add package.json release/* && git commit -m 'Add connect-rtc-js artifacts' --allow-empty
scripts.postversion: export GITTAG="echo $(git describe --abbrev=0 --tags | sed 's/^v//')" && git push --force --set-upstream origin bumpVersion --follow-tags && git checkout gh-pages && git pull && cp out/connect-rtc-debug.js ./connect-rtc-debug-`$GITTAG`.js && cp out/connect-rtc.min.js ./connect-rtc-`$GITTAG`.min.js && ln -fs connect-rtc-debug-`$GITTAG`.js connect-rtc-debug-latest.js && ln -fs connect-rtc-`$GITTAG`.min.js connect-rtc-latest.min.js && git add connect-rtc*.js && git commit -m `$GITTAG` && git push --set-upstream origin gh-pages && git checkout master
